programme.title: Clinton impeachment hearing
programme.short_synopsis: A discussion of the likely outcome of the hearing to decide on Clinton's impeachment.
programme.medium_synopsis: The House Judiciary Committee meets to decide on adoption of impeachment proceedings against Clinton Alistair Cooke considers this tortuous process and its likely outcome.
